title: 99 Quotes and Affirmations For Self-Love & Personal Development
description: This book is a collection of inspired quotes and affirmations I have written over time. As a self-love and personal development advocate, creating little snippets of wisdom is how I help myself and others not just survive, but thrive in this world. Our thoughts, perspective and attitude significantly impact, and ultimately create our reality.
author: Izey Victoria Odiase
